channel.title: VTI on Cisco Skills
channel.description: Recent content in VTI on Cisco Skills

item.title: VTIs with ASA
item.description: I've been stuck in more ways then one this year...working from home indefinitely seems to be the status quo right now, and I'm in "tunnel" mode for most part. Most of these projects I'm working on all of common theme.. connect on-premise to more cloud resources! One way to do that is using VTIs. (Virtual Tunnel Interfaces) VTIs which are not new...been around for a bit, Cisco IOS had the feature available like 10+ years ago!
